about_page.title: About Us
about_page.subtitle: A journey spanning over 30 years in serving the medical sector.
about_page.story_title: Leadership in Lab Setup and Scientific Solutions
about_page.story_p1: Al Eman Medical & Scientific Services was founded with an ambitious vision to bridge the gap in the Egyptian market.
about_page.story_p2: Over three decades, we have built strong relationships with major manufacturers globally.
about_page.story_p3: Today, we are proud to be the strategic partner for many universities and research centers.

about_page.vision_desc: To be the primary reference and most trusted platform in the Middle East for lab solutions.
